content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) and a Chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Furnace Group at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of multiple Furnaces at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), and (40.0, -79.0), each with a nearby Chest

### Electricity Generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine at position (10.5, 10.5), a Boiler at position (-6.0, 24.5), and an Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5), connected by Pipe Groups

### Lab at position (2.5, 0.5)
Consists of a Lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67} and nearby Chests

### Inserter Group at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of Burner Inserters at positions (3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5), each with a nearby Chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure that the Lab has the necessary input items before setting research
- Check that the research is valid and not already in progress

### Errors when getting research progress
- Ensure that the Lab has a research in progress before getting research progress
- Check that the research is valid and not already completed

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure that the entity has the necessary items to extract before extracting
- Check that the entity is at the correct position to extract items

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing
- Check that the entity can be placed at the specified position

### Errors when using Furnaces
- Ensure that the Furnace has the necessary fuel and input items before smelting
- Check that the Furnace is not already smelting an item

### Errors when using Boilers
- Ensure that the Boiler has the necessary fuel before generating steam
- Check that the Boiler is connected to a Pipe Group and has a valid fluid system

### Errors when using Offshore Pumps
- Ensure that the Offshore Pump is connected to a Pipe Group and has a valid fluid system
- Check that the Offshore Pump has a sufficient amount of fluid to pump
